snippet: Swiss third seed Stan Wawrinka outlasted tiring former champion Juan Martin del Potro in four sets to advance to the semi-finals of the U.S. Open on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Swiss third seed Stan Wawrinka outlasted tiring former champion Juan Martin del Potro in four sets to advance to the semi-finals of the U.S. Open on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Beats Del Potro to Reach U.S. Open Semis
headline.main: Wawrinka Beats Del Potro to Reach U.S. Open Semis
